attributes.action: Ask the goverment to help find missing British man Karl law
attributes.additional_details:
Builder Car Law went missing at 11.50pm on Saturday
In November 2014 after becoming split from a 13 strong stag party in Prague old town Square. He is a builder by trade and his family are frantic with worry and his, disappearance in Prague has been well publicised in the press. I ask if my E-Petition hits 100'000 signatures that This be debated in the House of Commons with view that the British goverment urge the Prague / Czech republic goverment to endeavour to find missing British man Karl Law
